Eudora.description: Eudora Social Media Website Developed a social media platform to share and look at your friendâ€™s gift wish lists. Developed using React, Se- mantic UI for the front end and Fire- base for the hosting, database, and storage. Used the Etsy API in order to query Etsy results for users to upload into their wish list. Contains all basic functionalities of a social media plat- form. Currently released beta version.

GIPHY Searcher.description: Created a React App that searches for gifs using the GIPHY API and Semantic UI for styling. It allows for social media sharing from search results.
